sentences.en: A pronoun must refer to one and only one antecedent to avoid vagueness or ambiguity.
sentences.cn: 代名词必须有一个，也只能有一个先行词，以免造成模糊或模棱两可。

sentences.en: As with all business writing, vagueness is the opposite of useful.
sentences.cn: 就所有的商业写作而言，模糊性是实用性的对立面。

sentences.en: For years, I lived in a world of vagueness that I could not adapt to.
sentences.cn: 几年时间我都生活在自己不能适应的模糊世界里。

sentences.en: He would have preferred that such unnatural things should have a greater vagueness.
sentences.cn: 他宁可这种不自然状态能更隐晦一些.

sentences.en: It had an outline in vagueness, and was flung out to be apprehended.
sentences.cn: 在有了模糊的轮廓后,(她)把它顺嘴说出来, 是让人领悟.

sentences.en: It is not only vagueness , of course, which produces this effect.
sentences.cn: 当然, 不仅仅是模糊造成了这种效果.

sentences.en: Our discussion identifies some of the vagueness in organizational life.
sentences.cn: 我们讨论弄清了组织生活中的一些不明确现象.

sentences.en: Semantic opacity covers such issues as ambiguity, vagueness and generality.
sentences.cn: 语义不明确包括多义(歧义) 、 模糊与概括(笼统).

sentences.en: Semantic vagueness is a phenomenon inherent and pervasive with language.
sentences.cn: 语义模糊是一种语言本有的现象,在单词中无处不在.

sentences.en: The indeterminacy in glosseme level comprises ambiguity, vagueness, fuzziness and generality.
sentences.cn: 义位的不确定性包括歧义 、 含混 、 模糊和笼统.

sentences.en: The present study concentrates on pragmatic vagueness as a strategy in Chinese courtroom response.
sentences.cn: 本文研究中国法庭答话中的语用含糊策略.

sentences.en: The scene had the swirling vagueness of a painting by Turner.
sentences.cn: 布景有着特纳油画令人眩晕的模糊不清.

sentences.en: To be sure, most managerial actions do not benefit from vagueness.
sentences.cn: 可以肯定, 大多数管理措施从含糊其辞中得不到好处.

sentences.en: Used in certain contexts, vague language has the feature of pragmatic vagueness.
sentences.cn: 模糊语言是一种言语交际现象,在一定语境中具有语用模糊性.

sentences.en: Vagueness , as an attribute of natural language, is studied from various aspects in different approaches.
sentences.cn: 模糊性是自然语言的属性之一,存在于语言的各个层面, 研究角度各异.

sentences.en: Vagueness is another thing we're not programmed to accept.
sentences.cn: 这种含糊不清也是我们事先没想到的.

sentences.en: Vagueness of speech message is a communicative means as well as one form of language.
sentences.cn: 话语信息模糊既是一种语言现象,也是一种交际手段.

sentences.en: Vagueness, in turn, led to incoherence.
sentences.cn: 模糊转而导致了毫无内部凝聚力.

words.tran_cn: 模糊的；含糊的；不明确的；暧昧的
